oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Evaluation of Rallyâ„¢ Dairy Feed on Holstein Transition Cow Performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Porter, P. A.
Standaert, F. E.
Mahoney, J. H.
Weakley, D. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: performance
transition period
dry matter intake
metabolic disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Improved performance during the transition period can have a significant impact on a dairy farm's profitability. Nutritional factors that promote dry matter (DM) intake and/or reduce the risk of metabolic disease can be a key factor in a manager's action plan.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2004; 298
